issues.description: The PersonService.getAllPersons method has conflicting return types: the template declares it returns List<Person>, and the problem statement and PersonResource expect to handle a List<Person>, but the solution changes it to return Stream<Person>. This mismatch will prevent the solution code from compiling and conflicts with the intended use of a List in the REST controller.
issues.suggested_fix: Restore the return type of getAllPersons to List<Person> in PersonService and collect the sorted Stream into a List (e.g., using .collect(Collectors.toList())) so that it matches the template signature and the controllerâ€™s expected List<Person>.
